statements: SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE id = 1
SELECT company_name, service_offered FROM CloudComputingData WHERE location = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE company_name LIKE '%Google%'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CloudComputingData
SELECT MAX(id) FROM CloudComputingData
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM CloudComputingData
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) FROM CloudComputingData GROUP BY company_name
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE service_offered = 'IaaS'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE location = 'Europe' OR location = 'Asia'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE company_name = 'Microsoft'
SELECT AVG(id) FROM CloudComputingData
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE company_name = 'Amazon' AND location = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM CloudComputingData)
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE service_offered LIKE '%PaaS%'
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE id > (SELECT AVG(id) FROM CloudComputingData)
SELECT * FROM CloudComputingData WHERE location IN ('USA', 'Canada')
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers
SELECT provider_name, headquarters_location FROM cloud_providers
SELECT * FROM cloud_services
SELECT service_name FROM cloud_services
SELECT cloud_providers.provider_name, cloud_services.service_name FROM cloud_providers JOIN cloud_services ON cloud_providers.provider_id = cloud_services.provider_id
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = 1
SELECT provider_name, headquarters_location FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = 2
SELECT * FROM cloud_services WHERE provider_id = 1
SELECT service_name FROM cloud_services WHERE provider_id = 2

SELECT cloud_providers.provider_name, cloud_services.service_name FROM cloud_providers JOIN cloud_services ON cloud_providers.provider_id = cloud_services.provider_id WHERE cloud_providers.provider_id = 1
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE headquarters_location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT * FROM cloud_services WHERE service_id = 3
SELECT provider_name FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = 2
SELECT service_name FROM cloud_services WHERE provider_id = 1 OR provider_id = 2
SELECT provider_name, service_name FROM cloud_providers JOIN cloud_services ON cloud_providers.provider_id = cloud_services.provider_id WHERE cloud_services.service_id > 5
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC
SELECT * FROM cloud_services ORDER BY service_name DESC
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(service_id) FROM cloud_providers JOIN cloud_services ON cloud_providers.provider_id = cloud_services.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name
SELECT MAX(service_id) FROM cloud_services
SELECT DISTINCT provider_name FROM cloud_providers
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT provider_name FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_name = 'Amazon';
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM cloud_providers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT MAX(provider_id) FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers ORDER BY provider_id;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE location = 'Europe' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) FROM cloud_providers GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM cloud_providers GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE '%cloud%';
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_name IN ('Azure', 'Google');
SELECT * FROM cloud_providers WHERE provider_id = (SELECT MAX(provider_id) FROM cloud_providers);
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, CASE WHEN location = 'USA' THEN 'Domestic' ELSE 'International' END AS category FROM cloud_providers;
SELECT * FROM instance;
SELECT provider, region FROM storage;
SELECT storage_id, storage_type FROM storage WHERE region='us-west';
SELECT * FROM network WHERE provider='AWS';
SELECT billing_id, cost FROM billing ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT instance_id, provider, region, instance_type FROM instance WHERE provider='Azure';
SELECT storage_id, storage_type FROM storage WHERE region='us-east' AND provider='GCP';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT instance_id, region, instance_type FROM instance WHERE region='eu-west';
SELECT * FROM network WHERE region='ap-southeast' AND provider='Azure';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE provider='AWS' AND cost < 50;
SELECT storage_id, region, storage_type FROM storage WHERE provider='Azure';
SELECT * FROM instance WHERE instance_type='small' OR instance_type='medium';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE provider='GCP';
SELECT * FROM network WHERE region='us-east' OR region='us-west';
SELECT billing_id, region, cost FROM billing WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM instance WHERE provider='AWS' AND region='us-west';
SELECT * FROM storage WHERE provider='GCP' AND region='ap-southeast';
SELECT SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM billing;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM billing WHERE provider='Azure';
